assessmentQuestionVersion.name: Tafamidis_Initial_Patient_Overview_Q3
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: 3. Does the patient have any of the following comorbidities/events?
assessmentQuestionVersion.responseValues: Anemia (Hgb <90 g/L) Dementia New or recurrent malignancies Palliative care or residing in long-term care facility Unplanned hospitalizations of any kind in the past year
